5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Aishah:“The Prophet (ﷺ) used to pray at night, and I was laying between him and the prayer direction, as a (body for a) funeral horizontally.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ صَلَّى وَبَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْقِبْلَةِ شَىْءٌ
chapter.eng-name: One who performs Prayer with something between himself and the Prayer direction
